ValidationRule.description: part of https://tracker.trustedshops.com/browse/PO-6921 - piclist value of account type should be restricted
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(Type, 'ECOMMERCE'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'LEGAL'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'THIRD_PARTY'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'STANDARD'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'EXPERIENCE_FEEDBACK'), ISPICKVAL(Type, 'BEYOND_ECOMMERCE')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The picklist value is not allowed. Please use one of the following: ECOMMERCE, LEGAL, THIRD_PARTY, STANDARD, EXPERIENCE_FEEDBACK, BEYOND_ECOMMERCE.
